title: $150k vs. $40k SPRINTER VAN (full tour)
author: Kara and Nate
description:
Which converted Sprinter van would you choose?! Get Surfshark VPN at https://surfshark.deals/karaandnate
and enter promo code KARAANDNATE for 83% off and 3 extra months for free!

We rented this Revel from Blacksford! If you are in Vegas and want to go on an adventure, definitely check them out! https://www.blacksford.com/las-vegas-rv-rentals

#vanlife Vlog 751 | #LasVegas , NV | Filmed Jan. 12, 2021 

📸 Follow us on Instagram for behind the scenes content: @karaandnate https://www.instagram.com/karaandnate/ 

🗺 Create your own CUSTOM route map from your favorite vacation, city, or road trip with our new site! https://atlas.co/ 

✈️ We created FareDrop to help you score super cheap international flights! Try it for free and get flight deals up to 80% off ➡️ https://faredrop.com/ ⬅️

📧 Sign up for our Sunday Summary email here - https://karaandnate.com/sunday-summary/

🎶 Download these copyright free songs we used in this episode - All are from here: http://bit.ly/epidemic_sound

——————————————————

💳 Here’s Nate’s FREE guide to airport lounge access: http://karaandnate.com/the-ultimate-guide-to-lounge-access/ 

👩🏻‍💻 Kara’s Behind the Scenes Guide to Editing a Vlog:
https://learn.karaandnate.com/p/how-to-edit-a-vlog/ 

🎥 Our current camera setup: https://karaandnate.com/travel-vlogging-gear/

——————————————————

Originally from Nashville, Tennessee, we got married June 2013 and quickly caught the #travel bug! We started “travel hacking” & finally decided we wanted to travel for one year. After 2 years of saving $ and over 2 million miles and points, we sold our cars and apartment and left home January 10, 2016. We started this #travelvlog to share our experiences with friends and family, then decided we really liked vlogging and traveling! After achieving our new goal of 100 countries before 2020 and all 7 continents, we have no plans to slow down anytime soon, and we are incredibly thankful to do something we love every day. :)

我们来自田纳西州的纳什维尔，2013年6月结婚，很快就抓住了#旅行的毛病! 我们开始 "旅行黑客"&最终决定我们想旅行一年。经过2年的储蓄$和超过200万英里和点，我们卖掉了我们的汽车和公寓，并离开家2016年1月10日。我们开始了这个#travelvlog与朋友和家人分享我们的经验，然后决定我们真的很喜欢vlogging和旅行! 在实现了2020年前100个国家和所有7大洲的新目标后，我们没有计划很快放慢脚步，我们非常感谢每天做我们喜欢的事情。)
